abstract: Look out Bill Gates, here comes Carlos Slim Helu. The Mexican telecoms mogul has breezed past Warren Buffett and is gaining on the Microsoft co-founder on the list of the world’s richest men, according to Forbes.
lead_paragraph: Look out Bill Gates, here comes Carlos Slim Helu. The Mexican telecoms mogul has breezed past Warren Buffett and is gaining on the Microsoft co-founder on the list of the world’s richest men, according to Forbes.

headline.main: Mexican Midas Edges Out Oracle of Omaha on Forbes List
